title: Troubles with Lol on mac
body:
I can login into the game but the client seems to take forever to response and after a while a small window pops up that says 'trying to reconnect...'. I'm using the new client but also tried with the old one where I can't even login. My internet works perfectly so I have no idea what the problem is.. Already trying for about 2 hours..Can anyone help me?
Using macOS Sierra Version 10.0.2 on a Macbook Pro.

replies.body:
Are you seeing this pop up after champ select? If so, your connection to our servers specifically, could be unstable or be fluctuating. I encourage you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to ensure all your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if these steps helped.

No, nothing happens if I hit the play button, as soon as I was clicking on profile or anything else it would lose connection, so I wouldn't even get close to champ select. It works fine again now although I haven't changed anything. Maybe it's when a huge number of people are online (Sunday evening). Weird..
